name: xregistry-package-registries
description: Unified xRegistry API wrapper for multiple package registries

scripts.build: npm install && cd npm && npm run build && cd ../pypi && npm run build && cd ../nuget && npm run build && cd ../maven && npm run build && cd ../oci && npm run build && cd ../bridge && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:npm: npm install && cd npm && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:pypi: npm install && cd pypi && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:maven: npm install && cd maven && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:nuget: npm install && cd nuget && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:oci: npm install && cd oci && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:bridge: npm install && cd bridge && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:minimal: npm install && cd test && npm install && cd ..
scripts.test:all: npm run test:standalone && npm run test:docker
scripts.test:standalone: npm run test:servers && npm run test:integration && npm run test:npm && npm run test:npm:basic && npm run test:npm:angular
scripts.test:servers: npm run test:npm:server && npm run test:pypi:server && npm run test:maven:server && npm run test:nuget:server && npm run test:oci:server
scripts.test:npm:server: npm run build:npm && cd test && npm run test:npm
scripts.test:pypi:server: npm run build:pypi && cd test && npm run test:pypi
scripts.test:maven:server: npm run build:maven && cd test && npm run test:maven
scripts.test:nuget:server: npm run build:nuget && cd test && npm run test:nuget
scripts.test:oci:server: npm run build:oci && cd test && npm run test:oci
scripts.test:docker: npm run test:integration:docker && npm run test:integration:bridge
scripts.test:npm: npm run build:npm && cd test && npm run test:npm
scripts.test:npm:angular: npm run build:npm && cd test && npm run test:npm:angular
scripts.test:npm:basic: npm run build:npm && cd test && npm run test:npm:basic
scripts.test:integration:docker: npm run build && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File test/run-docker-integration-tests.ps1
scripts.test:integration:bridge: npm run build:bridge && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File test/run-bridge-integration-tests.ps1
scripts.test:full-log:windows: npm run build && (npm run test:unit 2>&1 && npm run test:integration 2>&1 && npm run test:servers 2>&1 && npm run test:npm 2>&1 && npm run test:npm:basic 2>&1 && npm run test:npm:angular 2>&1 && npm run test:regression 2>&1) | tee test-results-full.log 2>&1 || echo "Some tests failed but continuing..." | tee -a test-results-full.log
scripts.test:full-log:bash: npm run build && { npm run test:unit 2>&1; npm run test:integration 2>&1; npm run test:servers 2>&1; npm run test:npm 2>&1; npm run test:npm:basic 2>&1; npm run test:npm:angular 2>&1; npm run test:regression 2>&1; } | tee test-results-full.log 2>&1; echo "Test run completed - check test-results-full.log for details"
